meanings.definition: A vertical shaft containing a staircase, typically in a building.
meanings.sent1: The stairwell in the house was narrow but well-lit.
meanings.sent2: She hurried down the stairwell to catch the elevator.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the stairwell was a perfect place to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a dark stairwell, each step leading deeper into confusion.
meanings.sent5: The musty smell of the stairwell lingered in her memory.

meanings.definition: The space or area surrounding a staircase.
meanings.sent1: The paintings on the walls of the stairwell added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: Children's laughter echoed through the empty stairwell.
meanings.sent3: The spider made a cozy home in the corner of the stairwell.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced up and down the stairwell of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the stairwell windows created a warm glow.
